definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: The policeman unhooked the collar of a uniform.
Don‘t forget to fasten the collar button.
I can't fasten this collar button.
never wears a bow-tie with a button-down shirt.
sentences.chinese: 穿帶衣領釦的襯衫時從不打蝶形領結。

sentences.english: My personal preference is two Zegna bars and a copy of the Times.
sentences.chinese: 我個人比較喜歡兩個傑尼亞領釦，和一份紐約時報。

sentences.english: Not only in the tie, untied shirt collar.
sentences.chinese: 只有在不打領帶時，才解開襯衫的領釦。

sentences.english: A crisp button-down shirt is a no-fail piece for the office.
sentences.chinese: 在辦公室裏穿上一件整潔的有衣領釦的襯衫，絕會錯。

sentences.english: The little girl can't fasten the collar button.
sentences.chinese: 那個小女孩系不上領釦。
